name: Brutal Rhythm
description:
The rhythm runs through your veins: get the best record by practicing before you start playing.

It's easy to play: just touch the screen to the rhythm of the sound and the song.

Do not lose concentration!: there are rhythmic events, focus and listen carefully and get to heaven!

There are currently 2 minigames available, more will be added soon in the updates.

The songs and art in this game have copyright permission.

More mini rhythm games coming soon!
